verses.name: Psalms 18:44
verses.text: As soon as they hear of me, they shall obey me: the strangers shall submit themselves unto me.

verses.name: Psalms 18:45
verses.text: The strangers shall fade away, and be afraid out of their close places.

verses.name: Psalms 18:46
verses.text: The Lord liveth; and blessed be my rock; and let the God of my salvation be exalted.

verses.name: Psalms 18:47
verses.text: It is God that avengeth me, and subdueth the people under me.

verses.name: Psalms 18:48
verses.text: He delivereth me from mine enemies: yea, thou liftest me up above those that rise up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.
